messages.subject: 2005 unschoolers beach party
messages.msgSnippet: I d come by myself, but then I thought, I don t think they would want me without Bob.  LOL We ll all be there. Well...I certainly wouldn t complain if you
messages.messageBody:
"I'd come by myself, but then I thought, I don't
think they would want me without Bob. LOL
We'll all be there."

Well...I certainly wouldn't complain if you were the only one that could come!! But more Wilkinson's are better than less of course. :)
I'm really glad you're all going to be here. I'll start posting stuff about plans and hotel and such this summer. I should have some good information by July.

Ren



"I never teach my pupils; I only attempt to provide the conditions in which they can learn."
Albert Einstein
